body: A  piece of history: Operation Barbarossa was the incursion of Nazi Germany into Russian lands. It was named after  Frederick Barbarossa, the Roman Emperor who put the Holy in the Holy Roman Empire- WW2 was a (un)Holy War of sorts- the Nazis and Fascists were 97% Christian, and Japan >95% Shinto- their only real powerful enemy was the "Godless" Commies; who accounted for 80+% of their troop losses. The USA/UK did well too- only losing 450/419K lives (each 1% of the total Commie losses), and still managing to take 10-15% of the kills. There were no winners in the war. There never are.

The Commies lost 27M Soviet+Chinese civilians at the hands of Germany/Japan in WW2. They killed 2M German civilians and raped 2 million "Jung Fraulines" in revenge. The USA didn't kill that many civilians, unless you count Dresden, and raped under 300K Jung Frau, after having lost 451K soldiers. The Brits lost 419K- not sure of their rape record.
Any real nazi officer would’ve shot those idiots as soon as they got in range to make physical contact.
